page.title: 18LIFE STYLES C. CROOKHAM
page.content: From our survey we found that less than 10% of families go regularly to church.Many went shopping at garden centres, D.I.Y. centres and the Sunday Market. Sunday is bath night!{REPORTS Sundays are the only days I get any rest.Even though it is one of my best days there are things I don't like about it. There are no really good television programmes on.On Sundays we usually have a roast meal and a pudding.For tea we just have a snack like sandwiches and an apple.On Sunday my sister and I go swimming. Because we swim on Sunday we do not have much time to go shopping.Sunday lunch is normally roast chicken.In the afternoon we go round Fleet Pond ,Helen and I take our bikes and Dad walks.For tea we normally have a cake like swiss roll.I wouldn't like Sundays to be change.
